nodes.text: Huun was a male Human who served as a commander in the Republic Army of the Galactic Republic during the Cold War against the Sith Empire. During the war he was stationed on the planet Balmorra where he controlled the operation of Cave 52, and contacted an Imperial aligned individual who attacked it via hologram.
Hunn is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Nolan North.
